channel.title: CVE Feed for ESDS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESDS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37570|2023-08-08T08:11:08.948Z -- esds -- emagic%20data%20center%20management%20suite
item.description: This vulnerability exists in ESDS Emagic Data Center Management Suit due to non-expiry of session cookie. By reusing the stolen cookie, a remote attacker could gain unauthorized access to the targeted system.
